hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibrahim bin Nashit that:He asked Ibn Shihab about ghusl on Friday. He said: "It is a sunnah; Salim bin 'Abdullah told me, narrating from his father, that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) spoke about it from the minbar

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ حَضِّ الإِمَامِ فِي خُطْبَتِهِ عَلَى الْغُسْلِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Imam Urging Ghusl During His Khutbah On Friday
